assets.description: Directed by Mark Szumski, we produced a 15-day stop motion shoot on our stage. Then composited the VFX in Flame with some CG characters we created in Maya.
assets.title: LEGO Roadtrip

assets.description: Combining still photography and CG elements in Flame, we created this whimsical spot for Mejier.
assets.title: Meijer
